about_the_game:
NeoGenesis: A New Frontier Awaits

Step into the immersive world of NeoGenesis, a captivating story-driven sci-fi adventure set in the year 2060. While humanity has achieved interplanetary travel, the limits of its ingenuity still bind its progress. In this expansive and meticulously crafted universe, the survival of civilization lies not in advanced technology but in the resilience and choices of its people.

NeoGenesis offers players the freedom to explore breathtaking, dynamic environments across alien landscapes, each teeming with secrets waiting to be uncovered. But this isn’t just a game about exploration—it's about creation. Players can engage in crafting, forging tools, weapons, and even advanced technology to aid their survival and improve their chances in an unforgiving world. Weapons are fully customizable, allowing for upgrades and modifications that reflect each player’s unique strategy and playstyle.

At the heart of the game is its intelligent and lifelike AI-powered NPCs, each with distinct personalities, histories, and goals. These characters aren’t just part of the scenery—they actively shape the player’s journey. Every interaction, whether through dialogue, collaboration, or conflict, influences the storyline and the game’s outcome. NPCs remember player choices, respond dynamically to decisions, and carry forward the consequences of those actions, creating a truly adaptive and immersive narrative experience.

The story of NeoGenesis unfolds based on the bonds players forge, the alliances they form, and the challenges they overcome. With the ability to craft, fight, and make critical choices, players take control of their destiny in a richly detailed universe where every decision matters. Will you thrive and lead humanity to a brighter future, or will the weight of your choices steer the story toward chaos?

In NeoGenesis, the future isn’t written—it’s crafted. Are you ready to shape it?

name: Genesis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: 3060ti RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i9
  • Graphics: rtx 4060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Explore the sci-fi world of NeoGenesis, set in 2060, where interplanetary travel meets human ambition. Experience a gripping 2-hour story-driven adventure with dynamic AI-powered NPCs that respond to your choices.
